title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (June 2010)
creator_credit: Penny Morison, Melanie Steptoe, Jimmy Pasakos, Deborah Horne, Barbara Lemon, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: These five stories were created by members of the general public as part of a Digital Storytelling workshop at ACMI. On the most part, the stories are tributes to the people in the participants families that have been important or inspiring them. They employ a variety of storytelling techniques that best convey the emotion and intention of the stories.
